DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect single intravenous infusion K201 compare placebo dose escalate manner conversion sinus rhythm , reduction subject 's symptom score , safety .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Intravenous K201 Restoration Sinus Rhythm Subjects With Symptomatic Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic atrial fibrillation 3 hour less 7 day ( dated symptom ) . Atrial fibrillation document ECG start study drug infusion . Previous exposure K201 QTcF ( Fridericia correction ) > 440 m QRS interval > 140 m Paced atrial pace ventricular rhythm ECG History receive another intravenous Class I Class III antiarrhythmic drug within 3 day randomization History amiodarone ( oral IV ) last 3 month . Clinical evidence history acute coronary syndrome ( e.g . myocardial infarction , unstable angina ) within 30 day prior randomization History fail electrical cardioversion time past History polymorphic ventricular tachycardia ( e.g . torsades de pointes ) History family history Long QT Syndrome History ventricular tachycardia require drug device therapy Ejection fraction 40 % less .
